item.description: Thursday, February 18 at Johnny D's come dance to a Haitian Relief benefit featuring Emeline Michel and special guests Zili Misik and Samba Tremeterra Emeline has emerged as the reigning queen of Haitian song. Her songs merge native Haitian compass and rara with jazz, pop, bossa nova and samba. A captivating performer, versatile vocalist, accomplished dancer, songwriter and producer. You can check her out on this video of the 'hope for haiti now' MTV performance below. This is going to be a really fun night. Cover is $20 with all proceeds going to the Haitian Music Microfinance Project. [url=http://microfundo.eventbrite.com/]Buy Tickets Online >>[/url] Make sure you bring your friends...
item.name: Haitian Music Microfinance Benefit with Emeline Michel
